availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, attorney. Kentucky native. Nominated as Whig candidate for state legislature in 1848. Elected president of Louisville Law library in 1853.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, Sixth Ward, p. 20. Lilian Semple Truman, The Louisville Law Library, 1839-1912 (Louisville: Smith & Dugan, 1912), 14. “The Nominations for the Legislature,” Louisville Morning Courier (Louisville, Ky.), July 7, 1848, p. 1.
